name: SheaMoisture Daily Hydration Body Lotion with 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Coconut Milk and Pro-Ceramides, Quickly Nourish & Soften Skin, 24H Moisturizing 16 oz
short_description: Our newly formulated SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration body lotion with Fair Trade Shea Butter + Pro-ceramides helps replenish skin and lock in moisture.
We’ve elevated the luxurious feel of our daily moisturizer blend by adding Pro-Ceramides to help restore the moisture barrier and give you healthier-looking skin.
Our skin care products, formulated with Fair-Trade Shea Butter, deliver 24H moisturization and have been tested by dermatologists to deliver for the needs of melanin-rich skin.
Infused with the best parts of the coconut, this non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin and contains zero parabens, phthalates, petrolatum, or mineral oil.
Make our upgraded body lotion part of your skin care routine. For max results, smooth lotion generously all over your body, after showering or before bed to seal all that moisture.
product_description: We’ve reinvented our SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration body lotion to bring you everything you’re looking for in skincare: a creamy, fast-absorbing consistency with no sticky or white residue, incredible moisturization for dry skin, and a new pump for easier distribution. So, when you’re searching for the best body lotion for dry skin that’s balanced for everyday use, we’re here for you. SheaMoisture Daily Hydration is infused with the best parts of the coconut and the world’s best shea butter + Pro-Ceramides for long-lasting moisture and elevated results. This luxurious formula, blended with 100% Virgin Coconut Milk and Fair Trade Shea Butter immediately nourishes and softens dry skin. Its non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving you with a silky-smooth finish and 24 hours of hydration. You’ll notice the impressive skin care benefits immediately! OUR STORY: SheaMoisture is the legacy of a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap, and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Shea Butter handcrafted by women in West Africa. We’re powered by purpose at SheaMoisture because with every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest in and serve Black communities (in the US and around the world).

name: Cetaphil Body Lotion, Advanced Radiance Lotion with Shea Butter for Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 oz, Pack of 2, Fragrance Free, Hypoallergenic, Non-Comedogenic
short_description: CETAPHIL ADVANCED RADIANCE LOTION: Hydrates dry, dull skin to reveal more radiant skin in just one use with 9 moisturizers including Shea Butter
REPLENISHES WITH 48-HOUR HYDRATION: Buttery smooth texture deeply hydrates for 48 hours by penetrating 10 surface layers deep, leaving skin with lasting hydration
REVEALS MORE RADIANT SKIN: Deeply hydrating formula visibly enhances skin's texture and luminosity to reveal glowing skin after just one use
DERMATOLOGIST BACKED INGREDIENT BLEND: With hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 (panthenol) and B3 (niacinamide)
DEVELOPED FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: The hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is free of parabens and fragrance
product_description: CETAPHIL Advanced Radiance Lotion reveals more radiant skin in one use. Formulated with nine moisturizing ingredients, including shea butter, to replenish and restore dry, dull skin. Enriched with a blend of key ingredients: hydrating glycerin, panthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrier, and niacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin texture and retain skin moisture barrier. This rich lotion immediately improves skin texture and luminosity, and provides long-lasting, 48-hour relief from dryness. Use daily to nourish dry skin and help restore skin natural barrier in just one week. Use with Advanced Radiance Cream for continuous skin hydration and restoration of drier areas like hands, feet, knees and elbows. This unique formula is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic (so it will not clog pores), fragrance and paraben free, and clinically proven to be gentle on all skin tones and types. Effectively defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity.

product_description: Reveal irresistibly soft skin with NIVEA Shea Nourish Body Lotion. Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter and Deep Nourishing Serum, this non-greasy, quick absorbing shea butter moisturizer is formulated for dry skin. It deeply moisturizes for 48 hours, makes skin feel silky smooth to touch, and delivers healthy-looking skin with every use. This moisturizing body lotion for women and men is dermatologically tested for skin compatibility and can be used as a foot lotion or hand lotion for dry skin. NIVEA is a trusted leader in skin care products, with more than 110 years of expertise. To use, apply this shea butter body lotion to your body daily for the best results. For a nourishing skin care routine, pair this daily moisturizing lotion with NIVEA Nourishing Shea Butter Body Wash.

name: Jergens Shea Fusion Vanilla Crush Body Lotion, Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Vitamin E, 14 Fl Oz
short_description: VANILLA CRUSH SCENTED LOTION - This lotion leaves your skin soft and lightly scented with the slightly addictive aroma of cozy vanilla, toasted almonds and warm sugar
MOISTURIZING BODY LOTION - Blended with naturally derived African shea butter and Vitamin E, Jergens lotion nourishes your skin to feel smooth and soft
UP TO 24 HOUR HYDRATION - Our scented lotion for women and men gives you touchably smooth hydration that lasts all day–up to 24 hours!
JERGENS IS LOTION YOU CAN FEEL GOOD ABOUT - Our dermatologist-tested scented body lotion is cruelty free, paraben free and contains no artificial dyes
DISCOVER YOUR SIGNATURE SCENT – Jergens Shea Fusion scented lotions delivers a fragrance to match every mood, from Lavender Dreams to Warm Amber
product_description: Have your cake and eat it too with this moisturizer. Jergens Shea Fusion Vanilla Crush Body Lotion blends the cozy, cuddly scent of vanilla, toasted almonds and warm sugar in a moisturizing body lotion. It helps your skin feel soft as a cloud. (A smooth, buttercream cloud!) Get touchably smooth hydration that lasts all day–up to 24 hours! This is a dermatologist tested shea butter lotion that you can feel really good about using on your skin. That’s because it’s cruelty free, paraben free and contains no artificial dyes. Our formula is kind to people and kind to the planet. How? It’s manufactured using 100% certified renewable energy and it’s safe for the environment because it maximizes biodegradability and it respects aquatic life too. Jergens Shea Fusion is a collection of scented, 24 hour body lotions, swirled with addicting scents. These scented lotions nourish your skin for touchably smooth hydration and inspire your senses with irresistible fragrances that reflect your unique style. Explore the whole collection of Jergens lotion. Jergens Shea Fusion body lotion also comes in Lavender Dreams and Warm Amber. No matter which moisturizer you select, it’s touchably soft hydration with can’t-get-enough scent. Just try to stop smelling it.

name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Tahitian Vanilla Body Lotion, 13.5 Oz, Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Shea Butter & Vitamin E, Hydrates & Protects, Helps Provide 48-Hour Deep Moisture
short_description: Deep Hydration & Protection: Crafted with soothing and protecting Shea Butter and Sweet Almond Oil, this vegan friendly moisturizing body lotion for dry skin provides up to 48 hours of hydration, helping replenish and protect skin for a soft, silky feel

Luxurious Vanilla Scent: Drench your skin in luxuriously comforting moisture, with the aromatic embrace of vanilla bean and caramelized sugar to bring subtle sweetness. This dry skin lotion is perfect for daily use, whether at home, work, or on the go

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Choose What's Real: Our nourishing skin care and hair care products feature real, high-quality, plant-based ingredients. Our product line for whole body care includes body butter, creams, balms, lotions, oils, soaps, pregnancy and stretch mark care

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair
product_description: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Tahitian Vanilla Body Lotion, 8.5 Oz, Hydrates and Protects Skin, Helps Provide 48-Hour Deep Moisture Indulge in deep hydration and comforting moisture with Palmer’s Dermatologist approved Cocoa Butter Formula Tahitian Vanilla Body Lotion. Specially crafted with Shea Butter and Sweet Almond Oil, this body lotion helps protect skin, and provides long-lasting moisture for up to 48 hours, leaving skin feeling soft and silky. The warm, inviting scent blends vanilla bean with caramelized sugar, wrapping you in a cozy, nostalgic fragrance that has layers of depth. Perfect for daily use, whether at home, work, or on the go, this body moisturizer is a must-have for your body care routine. Perfect for all skin types. Palmer’s products are made with real, high-quality ingredients, no animal ingredients or testing. This skin lotion is vegan-friendly and free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and dyes. Sustainably sourced Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E, and Tahitian Vanilla work together to nourish, replenish, and soften skin. Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula uses the highest quality natural ingredients for superior moisturization head-to-toe.

short_description: 24HR MOISTURIZING – This body lotion provides continuous hydration, keeping your skin feeling soft and hydrated all day.
EXTRA DRY SKIN REPAIR – Formulated to soothe extra dry skin, this lotion delivers deep hydration that repairs and revitalizes for a softer, healthier feel
INSTANT ABSORPTION – A fast-absorbing lightweight formula to deliver instant hydration without a greasy feel.
SHEA BUTTER BLEND – Crafted with a nourishing Shea Butter Blend to ensure your skin receives deep and lasting moisturization
MADE WITHOUT – Each body lotion is made without heavy perfumes, parabens or phthalates, making it an ideal option for those seeking a more natural, gentle option.
product_description: Experience 24-hour moisturization with Ivory Hand & Body Lotion, the perfect blend of nourishment and care for hydrated skin all day long. Formulated with a nourishing shea butter blend, this lotion repairs extra dry skin for long lasting moisture. Its fast-absorbing, lightweight formula ensures your skin feels soft and smooth to the touch without leaving a greasy residue, making it perfect for daily use. Enjoy the gentle, comforting notes of vanilla that soothes the senses with every use. Give your skin the peace of mind and loving care it deserves with a formula that’s free from heavy perfumes, parabens and phthalates, dermatologist tested and never tested on animals. With over 140 years of family trust, Ivory is dedicated to delivering simple, effective products that care for both your skin and the environment. Choose Ivory Hand & Body Lotion for a nourishing experience that combines tradition, innovation, and gentle care for your skin.

short_description: WHIPPED VANILLA JOY: Feel elated with the sweet scents of warm vanilla and luscious fruits
EDIBLE & SWEET SCENT: Indulge in the aroma of Vanilla Blossom, Sandalwood, and Gardenia
SUPER MOISTURIZING: Shea butter, cocoa butter, and jojoba oil to hydrate
NON-GREASY FORMULA: Creamy and ultra-hydrating without leaving greasy residue
GENTLE ON SKIN: Gentle enough to fit into your daily beauty routine
NO HARSH INGREDIENTS: No sulfates, no aluminum, and paraben & phthalate free
product_description: Say bye to dry, and take your get-ready routine to the next level with decadent and luscious vanilla blossom, sandalwood, and gardenia when you moisturize with Bodycology Whipped Vanilla Shea Butter Body Cream. Your skin will thank you for using our ultra-hydrating and non-greasy formula of shea butter, cocoa butter, and jojoba oil. When you lather your skin in our Whipped Vanilla Body Cream, you’ll surround yourself in a bouquet of floral gardenia and night blooming jasmine along with a warm base of vanilla sugar to round it out. Use this fragranced cream as a form of special self-care or make it a part of your daily beauty ritual. You can layer this scent with the Bodycology beauty products you love like the matching Whipped Vanilla Fragrance Body Mist or with our other body sprays to create your own signature scent. All Bodycology products are paraben, phthalate, and cruelty-free.
